    The Best Reasons to Choose the Accord

    The most impressive Honda ever

    Explore the innovative features that put the Accord in a class of its own.
    WATCH VIDEO

    Why the Accord Beats the Camry

    From technology to performance to comfort, here's why only the Accord is 2018 North American Car of the Year.
    COMPARE NOW

    Meet the Accord family

    With three available powertrains in the Accord family, theres an option for everyone.
    EXPLORE ACCORD MODELS

    The Art of Evolution

    A Strong Stance

    The bold exterior is the result of thoughtful engineering, expressed through strong character lines, LED Low-Beam Headlights with Auto-On/Off and LED Fog Lights.

    Intelligent Design

    The front-end is as innovative as it is distinctive, with Active Grille Shutters and Air Curtains that help improve aerodynamics and efficiency.

    A Side of Sophistication

    With a muscular, fastback-inspired design, the 2018 Accord offers passengers head-turning style with ample space.

    Power Ahead

    The performance-inspired exterior holds a wide stance with strong lines that span the length of the car for a constant look of forward motion.

    A Lasting Impression

    The LED Taillights complement the refined design, while integrated Chrome Exhaust Finishers accent the dual-outlet exhaust for a true sport look.

    LED Headlights with Auto-On/Off standard on Touring. LED Fog Lights standard on Sport, EX, EX-L and Touring.

    17-inch Alloy Wheel (LX)

    The standard 17-inch Alloy Wheels on the LX provide a clean modern design that adds to the solid stance of the Accord.

    17-inch Alloy Wheel (Hybrid)

    The 17-inch Alloy Wheels on Hybrid models offer a fresh look to prove excitement and efficiency can coexist in perfect balance.

    17-inch Alloy Wheel (EX, EX-L)

    EX and EX-L models come standard with a 17-inch Alloy Wheel that effortlessly combines fluid dynamics with mechanical design.

    19-inch Alloy Wheel (SPORT)

    The 19-inch Alloy Wheels for Sport have a machine-finished face with gloss black inserts resulting in an aggressive twisted five-spoke design.

    19-inch Alloy Wheel (TOURING)

    The available 19-inch Alloy Wheels create a strong aesthetic statement and keep you grounded with a bold stance on the road.

    19-inch Black Alloy Wheel

    These 19-inch Black Alloy Wheels are the perfect accessory for those looking to add a custom touch and a lot more attitude to their new Accord.

    Decklid Spoiler

    The Decklid Spoiler complements the redesigned exterior while the contrast of the added gloss black lip hints at the performance of Accord.

    Rear Trim

    Give your Accord a personalized, subtle and stylish trim with the Rear Trim accessory.

    Front Grille

    The Front Grille accessory, available in Black Chrome for an aggressive and sporty edge or Chrome Finish for an upscale addition to your Accord.

    Front Fender Emblem

    Add a sport-inspired design detail to your new Accord with the Front Fender Emblem.

    Puddle Light

    Puddle Lights illuminate the ground beneath the doors to help you avoid surprises when exiting your Accord.

    Inside an Icon

    The quiet cabin features high-quality, soft-touch materials and an expansive front view for an exciting combination of elegance and convenience.

    Next-Generation Features

    Quality. Control.

    Ergonomic design meets soft-touch, high-quality trimincluding a Leather-Wrapped Steering Wheelto create a cabin unlike any other.

    Customize Your Drive

    A full-color 7-inch Driver Interface in the Accord Hybrid offers a customizable digital in-dash display, simplifying access to the info you need.

    The Lap of Luxury

    Plush Leather-Trimmed Seating features elegant stitching and top-notch craftsmanship that help make every drive more comfortable and enjoyable.

    Insider Perspective

    The concert-hall-inspired cabin allows for an uninterrupted view while Active Noise Cancellation contributes to an incredibly quiet interior.

    Standard on Sport, EX-L and Touring.

    A Comfortable Experience

    Accord delivers style and space for driver and passengers alike with an impressive amount of rear headroom and legroom.

    Heated & Ventilated Seating

    Front and rear outboard seats are heated for an extra level of warmth when needed. For hot days, the front seats are ventilated as well.

    Personalized Seating

    With available 12-way power-adjustability and two savable positions, no other car in its class offers more ways to adjust your seat with ease*.

    Climate Perfection

    Dual-Zone Automatic Climate Control helps keep temperatures ideal for you and your passengers. Color-changing backlit knobs add sophistication.

    EV Mode

    EV Mode on Hybrid models gives you the ability to operate exclusively on the batteries and electric motor in certain conditions.

    At the Center

    The versatile center console storage compartment provides a secure space for your belongings while maintaining a clean aesthetic.

    Room for the Road

    The generous, class-leading trunk space* gives you plenty of room for gear, groceries or whatever you need to fill your life for the road ahead.*

    Flexible Seating

    60/40 Split Fold-Down Rear Seats offer the versatility needed to accommodate both the expected and unexpected demands of everyday.*

    EV Mode standard on Hybrid models. 10-Speed Automatic Transmission standard on 2.0T models.

    All-Season Mat

    Wet boots. Muddy shoes. Dog hair. No problem. All-Season Floor Mats* act as a protective layer between nature and your original carpets.

    Illuminated Door Sill

    Blue LED lights on the door sill illuminate when the door is open for a finishing touch thats subtle, tasteful and upscale.

    Trunk Drawer

    The Trunk Drawer offers an ingenious solution that keeps small belongings accessible and helps prevent items from sliding around.

    Cargo Hook

    The Cargo Hook, located in the spacious trunk, conveniently hold bags upright by their handles.

    Honda Sensing Standard

    Every Accord comes with Honda Sensing standard, an intelligent suite of safety and driver-assistive technologies that can help you stay aware on the road and could even help avoid a collision. Its the most comprehensive suite offered standard in its class among midsize sedans*. Features include:
  • Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS)*
  • Road Departure Mitigation System (RDM)*
  • Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Low-Speed Follow*
  • Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS)*
  • Traffic Sign Recognition (TSR)*

    • Honda Sensing Traffic Sign Recognition (TSR) feature standard on 2018 Accord models only.

    Thrilling Powertrains

    Accord offers three advanced powertrains, including 1.5L and 2.0L turbocharged engines, and a next generation two-motor hybrid system.

    Agility & Control

    Accord delivers safety and driver-assistive technology standard with a seriously fun, refined and fuel-efficient driving experience.

    Control the Thrill

    Add to the thrill with available Paddle Shifters, a standard 6-Speed Manual on Sport models or Deceleration Selectors on Hybrid models.

    Smooth & Confident

    An Adaptive Damper System actively controls suspension action, while Wheel Resonators help minimize road noise for a refined driving experience.

    Keyless Sophistication

    Leave the key fob in your pocket with Smart Entry and Push Button Start. Walk Away Auto Lock saves you a step once youve arrived.

    Energy Management System Display

    The high resolution, touch-screen Energy Management System Display in the Accord Hybrid shows real-time energy flow between the engine and electric motor.

    Head-Up Display

    The Head-Up Display shows important information such as speed, turn-by-turn directions and incoming calls, all in the drivers line of sight.

    Satellite-Linked Navigation

    The Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System* features maps with 3D renderings and provides lane guidance and live search functionality.*

    Multi-Angle Awareness

    The Multi-Angle Rearview Camera* shows more of whats behind you. An available Cross Traffic Monitor* alerts you to vehicles on either side.

    Blind Spot Information

    With sensors in the rear bumper and warning icons in both side mirrors to alert you when vehicles are detected, change lanes with added confidence.*

    Auto High-Beam Headlights

    Standard Auto High-Beam Headlights automatically dim when other vehicles are detected, and the LED Low-Beam Headlights with Auto-On/Off further light the road ahead.

    Premium Audio System

    An available 8-inch Display Audio Touch-Screen and 10-Speaker Premium Audio System help make every moment a beauty for the senses.

    Apple CarPlay Integration

    Apple CarPlay* lets you focus on the road while accessing the music library, directions and audible text messages on your linked iPhone through the audio display in the Accord.

    Android Auto Integration

    Android Auto connects the Accord with your compatible Android phone for destinations, appointments and even the weather.*

    Wireless Charging

    No more need for adapters and cords. The Wireless Phone Charger provides a hassle-free charging zone thats easy to use with compatible phones*.

    HondaLink

    Stay connected with the HondaLink app and turn on your engine with Remote Start, lock or unlock your doors and more, all from your smartphone*. See package details here.

    Mobile Hotspot

    Enjoy wireless streaming capabilities, including audio system updates by turning your Accord into a mobile hotspot with an available data plan from AT&T.

    Display Audio Touch-Screen standard on Sport, EX, EX-L and Touring. Premium Audio System standard on EX-L and Touring.

    Accessorize to Impress

    Attain even more sophisticated levels of styling with Honda Genuine Accessories.
    LEARN MORE
